name: @gnosis.pm/dx-uniswap-arbitrage
description: An Ethereum contract to execute arbitrage functions against DutchX protocol

scripts.rpc: ganache-cli -d --mnemonic 'grid voyage cream cry fence load stove sort grief fuel room save' --defaultBalanceEther '500000000000000000000'
scripts.networks-reset: mkdir -p build/contracts && npx truffle networks --clean && npm run networks-inject
scripts.restore: rm -rf build && npm run compile && npm run networks-reset
scripts.debug: npx truffle compile --reset --compile-all && npx truffle test test/Debug.js
scripts.install: cd $INIT_CWD && npm explore truffle -- npm install solc@0.5.2

author: Billy Rennekamp <billy.rennekamp@gmail.com>
